report.name: 企业税收收入

paraDetail.sql: select distinct bm,name,pid,isleaf from( select bm,mc name,pid,isleaf from (select * from bm_cont where table_bm='BM_CZFP') connect by prior pid=bm start with BM IN (select czfpbm from user_xz where userid={userid}) ) order by bm
select bm,isleaf,pid,mc name from bm_cont_xs where table_bm='BM_HY' order by bm

report.paraProcesses:
SELECT to_char(sysdate,'yyyy') from dual
SELECT to_char(sysdate,'mm') from dual
SELECT to_char(sysdate,'dd') from dual
-->
report.title: $nian$$yue$企业税收收入

rptData.sql: select * from (select * from ( select SWDJZH,a.MC,round(sum(CZZSR/10000),2) CZZSR,round(sum(DFCZSR/10000),2) DFCZSR,round(sum(ZJDFCZSR/10000),2) ZJDFCZSR, round(sum(DSHJ/10000),2) DSHJ,round(sum(S102/10000),2) S102,round(sum(S151_DS/10000),2) S151_DS,round(sum(S105_DS/10000),2) S105_DS, round(sum(S110/10000),2) S110,round(sum(S108/10000),2) S108,round(sum(S111/10000),2) S111,round(sum(S106/10000),2) S106,round(sum(S115/10000),2) S115, round(sum(S116/10000),2) S116,round(sum(S114/10000),2) S114,round(sum(S174/10000),2) S174,round(sum(S173/10000),2) S173,round(sum(GSHJ/10000),2) GSHJ, round(sum(S101/10000),2) S101,round(sum(S1010101/10000),2) S1010101,round(sum(S1010104/10000),2) S1010104,round(sum(S151_GS/10000),2) S151_GS, round(sum(S103/10000),2) S103,round(sum(DSQTHJ/10000),2) DSQTHJ,round(sum(S161/10000),2) S161,round(sum(S181/10000),2) S181, round(sum(S421/10000),2) S421,round(sum(S418/10000),2) S418,round(sum(S162/10000),2) S162,round(sum(S281/10000),2) S281, round(sum(S321/10000),2) S321,round(sum(JJHJ/10000),2) JJHJ,round(sum(S294/10000),2) S294,round(sum(S284/10000),2) S284, round(sum(S283/10000),2) S283,round(sum(S285/10000),2) S285,round(sum(S286/10000),2) S286,round(sum(S298/10000),2) S298, round(sum(XSZHJ/10000),2) XSZHJ,round(sum(GTHJ/10000),2) GTHJ,round(sum(GTS101/10000),2) GTS101,round(sum(GTS102/10000),2) GTS102, round(sum(GTS105/10000),2) GTS105,round(sum(GTS110/10000),2) GTS110,round(sum(TSHJ/10000),2) TSHJ,round(sum(S101010301/10000),2) S101010301, round(sum(S101010302/10000),2) S101010302,round(sum(JRHJ/10000),2) JRHJ,round(sum(JRS102/10000),2) JRS102,round(sum(JRS151/10000),2) JRS151, round(sum(XSSR/10000),2) XSSR,round(sum(JZC/10000),2) JZC,round(sum(JLR/10000),2) JLR, decode(substr(jjxzbm,1,1),4,1,0) isgt,0 ylbj,C.MC CZFP,H.MC HYDL,a.hybm_dj hybm,a.czfpbm czfpbm from dnft4.bb_srpm_2013 a,BM_CZFP_XS C,BM_HY_XS Y,BM_HY_ZL_XS H where nian={nian} and yue={yue} AND a.czfpbm=c.bm and a.hybm_dj=y.bm and y.zlbm=h.bm group by SWDJZH,a.MC,decode(substr(jjxzbm,1,1),4,1,0),C.MC,H.MC,a.hybm_dj,a.czfpbm union all select SWDJZH,a.MC, round(sum(CZZSR/10000),2) CZZSR,round(sum(DFCZSR/10000),2) DFCZSR,round(sum(ZJDFCZSR/10000),2) ZJDFCZSR, round(sum(DSHJ/10000),2) DSHJ,round(sum(S102/10000),2) S102,round(sum(S151_DS/10000),2) S151_DS,round(sum(S105_DS/10000),2) S105_DS, round(sum(S110/10000),2) S110,round(sum(S108/10000),2) S108,round(sum(S111/10000),2) S111,round(sum(S106/10000),2) S106, round(sum(S115/10000),2) S115,round(sum(S116/10000),2) S116,round(sum(S114/10000),2) S114,round(sum(S174/10000),2) S174,round(sum(S173/10000),2) S173, round(sum(GSHJ/10000),2) GSHJ,round(sum(S101/10000),2) S101,round(sum(S1010101/10000),2) S1010101,round(sum(S1010104/10000),2) S1010104, round(sum(S151_GS/10000),2) S151_GS,round(sum(S103/10000),2) S103,round(sum(DSQTHJ/10000),2) DSQTHJ,round(sum(S161/10000),2) S161, round(sum(S181/10000),2) S181,round(sum(S421/10000),2) S421,round(sum(S418/10000),2) S418,round(sum(S162/10000),2) S162,round(sum(S281/10000),2) S281, round(sum(S321/10000),2) S321,round(sum(JJHJ/10000),2) JJHJ,round(sum(S294/10000),2) S294,round(sum(S284/10000),2) S284,round(sum(S283/10000),2) S283, round(sum(S285/10000),2) S285,round(sum(S286/10000),2) S286,round(sum(S298/10000),2) S298,round(sum(XSZHJ/10000),2) XSZHJ,round(sum(GTHJ/10000),2) GTHJ, round(sum(GTS101/10000),2) GTS101,round(sum(GTS102/10000),2) GTS102,round(sum(GTS105/10000),2) GTS105,round(sum(GTS110/10000),2) GTS110, round(sum(TSHJ/10000),2) TSHJ,round(sum(S101010301/10000),2) S101010301,round(sum(S101010302/10000),2) S101010302,round(sum(JRHJ/10000),2) JRHJ, round(sum(JRS102/10000),2) JRS102,round(sum(JRS151/10000),2) JRS151,round(sum(XSSR/10000),2) XSSR,round(sum(JZC/10000),2) JZC, round(sum(JLR/10000),2) JLR, decode(substr(jjxzbm,1,1),4,1,0) isgt,1 ylbj,C.MC CZFP,H.MC HYDL,a.hybm_dj hybm,a.czfpbm czfpbm from dnft4.bb_srpm_2013 a,BM_CZFP_XS C,BM_HY_XS Y,BM_HY_ZL_XS H where nian={nian} and yue<={yue} AND a.czfpbm=c.bm and a.hybm_dj=y.bm and y.zlbm=h.bm group by SWDJZH,a.MC,decode(substr(jjxzbm,1,1),4,1,0),C.MC,H.MC,a.hybm_dj,a.czfpbm) where ylbj={bblx} and swdjzh like '%%' and mc like '%%' and czfpbm in ([czfpbm]) and hybm in (select distinct bm from ( select a.*,level from (select * from bm_cont_xs where table_bm='BM_HY') a connect by prior bm =pid start with (pid in ([hybm]) or bm in ([hybm]))) where isleaf='1')) where isgt in ([isgt]) order by CZZSR desc
